text: Resident Evil 4, known in Japan as , is a survival horror third-person shooter video game developed by Production Studio 4 and published by multiple publishers, including Capcom, Ubisoft and Nintendo of Australia. It is the sixth game in the Resident Evil series. == References == Category:2005 video games Category:2000s horror video games Category:Resident Evil Category:Capcom games Category:Android (operating system) games Category:IOS games Category:Meta Quest games Category:Nintendo GameCube games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:PlayStation Network games Category:Single-player video games Category:Survival horror video games Category:Survival video games Category:Third-person shooters Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Wii games Category:Windows games Category:Xbox 360 games Category:Xbox 360 Live Arcade games Category:Xbox One games Category:Zeebo games
title: Resident Evil 4
